title: Fashionphile CEO on Differentiating in Luxury Resale
description: Ben Hemminger, CEO and co founder of Fashionphile, says the company’s specialty allows it to price items accurately and buy directly from sellers, taking on the resale risk itself. He speaks with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close.” (Source: Bloomberg)
